Package applications

Class Summary
ContrastStretcher The ContrastStretcher is used if all pixels are in the lower or upper range of the histogram to scale them to the full range.
Converter this class converts an image to another format.
CreateGradientImage command line program for applying the sobel operator to an image.
DisplayImage this is an optional programm used to display images.
GammaCorrection the GammaCorrection is used if an image is under or overexposed. it improves the local contrast of an image.
Histogram generates a textual output of the histogram of an image,
usage: Histogram [picturepath]
the histogram is print to standard output.
HistogramEqualization applies histogram equalisation to an image.
SegmGlobalThreshold command line program for creating a segmentation mask using global thresholding.
SegmIterativeGlobalThreshold command line program for creating a segmentation mask using iterative global thresholding.
SegmOtsusMethod command line program for creating a segmentation mask using otsus method.
SharpenAnImage command line program for sharpening an image using laplace or sobel filter.
UseAveragingFilter command line program for applying an averaging filter to an image.
UseLaplacianFilter command line program for applying a laplacian filter to an image.
UseMedianFilter command line program for applying an median filter to an image.
